metadata.title: CVE-2015-0308 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
Use-after-free vulnerability in Adobe Flash Player before 13.0.0.260 and14.x through 16.x before 16.0.0.257 on Windows and OS X and before11.2.202.429 on Linux, Adobe AIR before 16.0.0.245 on Windows and OS X andbefore 16.0.0.272 on Android, Adobe AIR SDK before 16.0.0.272, and AdobeAIR SDK & Compiler before 16.0.0.272 allows attackers to execute arbitrarycode via unspecified vectors.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-0308` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

flashplugin-downloader - 11.2.202.429ubuntu0.14.04.1
flashplugin-installer - 11.2.202.429ubuntu0.14.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: flashplugin-nonfree package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '11.2.202.429ubuntu0.14.04.1').
